title: GrammarViz-Multivariate
description: Multivariate extension of the GrammarViz3 algorithm.

parameters.name: anomaly_window_size
parameters.description: Size of the sliding window. Equal to the discord length!

parameters.name: output_mode
parameters.description: Algorithm to use for output [Density, Discord, Full]

parameters.name: multi_strategy
parameters.description: Strategy to handle multivariate output [Merge all, Merge clustered, All separate]

parameters.name: paa_transform_size
parameters.description: Size of the embedding space used by PAA (paper calls it number of frames or SAX word size `w`) (performance parameter)

parameters.name: alphabet_size
parameters.description: Number of symbols used for discretization by SAX (paper uses `\alpha`) (performance parameter)

parameters.name: normalization_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for Z-normalization of subsequences (windows). If variance of a window is higher than this threshold, it is normalized.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator

parameters.name: n_discords
parameters.description: Number of discords to report when using discord output strategy
